//notes: the tumbler draws 90Wh, but since it can't be used as a connected appliance, we have to resort to heavy batteries

given that 90 watts per hour is 324kJ, and no battery in the game can supply this much (let alone a portable one), we shall pretend that a heavy battery is enough to run a single 1-hour cycle of the tumbler
realistically, the cycle should run for at least 4 hours on a full load (casings + tumbling media + water)
description: TBL100 rotary case tumbler by Hornady.  A powered desktop rotary device, similar to a tiny cement mixer, that can be used to clean spent casings, enabling their safe reloading.  Casings must be deprimed before cleaning, as a safety precaution.  This model has its power connection replaced with a large-battery interface, making it usable on the road and off the grid.

notes: we assume that the more-precise dimensions belong to the item, though it could just as likely be that of the package, since the package is easier to measure precisely
